description: Gets an Amazon Web Services Migration Hub Refactor Spaces application.

nested_items.name: ApiGatewayProxy
nested_items.description: The endpoint URL of the API Gateway proxy.

nested_items.name: ApiGatewayId
nested_items.description: The resource ID of the API Gateway for the proxy.

nested_items.name: EndpointType
nested_items.description: The type of API Gateway endpoint created.

nested_items.name: NlbArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Network Load Balancer configured by the API Gateway proxy.

nested_items.name: NlbName
nested_items.description: The name of the Network Load Balancer that is configured by the API Gateway proxy.

nested_items.name: ProxyUrl
nested_items.description: The endpoint URL of the API Gateway proxy.

nested_items.name: StageName
nested_items.description: The name of the API Gateway stage. The name defaults to prod.

nested_items.name: VpcLinkId
nested_items.description: The VpcLink ID of the API Gateway proxy.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: CreatedByAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the application creator.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the application is created.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the resource owner.

nested_items.name: AdditionalDetails
nested_items.description: Additional details about the error.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error.

nested_items.name: ResourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the application owner (which is always the same as the environment owner account ID).

nested_items.name: ProxyType
nested_items.description: The proxy type of the proxy created within the application.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the application.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).
